level.heading: Quorum of members.
level.text: Unless the organic rules otherwise require a greater number of members or percentage of the voting power, the voting member or members present at a members meeting shall constitute a quorum.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 29-1001.09.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 510 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
